summary:
This mod allows you to create all of the Original Vampire Races without having to go into a lot of trouble finding another vampire just to be infected. You can now start as a vampire!!

This also removes the irritating BLUR visual effect when you entered an exterior cell during daytime. [i]the actual magic effect is still there
descriptionHtml:
[size=1][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]Ownership: Loshirai14[/b][/right][/font][/color][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]User ID: 4958627[/b][/right][/font][/color][color=orange][font=arial][right][b]Don't forget to VOTE and ENDORSE![/b][/right][/font][/color][/size]
[center][size=6][font=papyrus]Requires Dawnguard and Skyrim 1.6.89 or higher[/font][/size][/center]
[center][font=papyrus][size=4]Check out my other mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/Images/179291]HERE[/url][/size][/font][/center]
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25373-1-1354860609.png[/img][/center]
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-2-1353144913.png[/img]
This mod allows you to create all of the Original Vampire Races without having to go into a lot of trouble finding another vampire just to be infected. You can now start as a vampire!!

This also removes the irritating BLUR visual effect when you entered an exterior cell during daytime. [i]the actual magic effect is still there[/i]

PERMANENTLY FIXES THE VAMPIRE "BODY AND HEAD COLOR MISMATCH" FOR VANILLA RACES
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-3-1353144913.png[/img]
Adds 10 original vampire races with level 4 vampire spells
- Vampire Argonian
- Vampire Khajiit
- Vampire Breton
- Vampire Nord
- Vampire Imperial
- Vampire Orc
- Vampire Dark Elf
- Vampire Wood Elf
- Vampire High Elf
- Vampire Redguard
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-4-1353144913.png[/img]
- download the latest version
- extract files with winRAR
- copy file and paste it in your data folder
- overwrite if asked
- start the game and enjoy
[img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/25580-5-1353144913.png[/img]
Please ask for my permission if you are going to edit, translate or re-upload this mod to other community sites!!
author: Loshirai14

files.name: Original Vampire Races - Character Creation
files.changelogHtml: Adds 10 original vampire races and remove BLUR effect
